project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the National Highway Project are to: a) relieve transport congestion and improve the integration of interregional commerce by assisting in the development of National Highway 107; b) facilitate access within the area of influence; c) strengthen the interprovincial coordination of trunk road operations and promote the free flow of goods and travelers between Hebei and Henan; and d) improve road investment planning. The project comprises: 1) the construction of the Shijiazhuang-Xinxiang four-lane divided, access-controlled highway; 2) and Interconnecting Roads Improvement Program (IRIP) in Hebei and Henan for upgrading 14 provincial highways interconnecting and interchanges with the project highway; 3) construction supervision of the project highway and the IRIP; 4) the coordination of the interprovincial Shijiazhuang-Xinxiang highway operations and a study of facilitation of interprovincial traffic flows; 5) a study of highway capacity; 6) staff training; and 7) purchase of equipment for highway operation and maintenance, road laboratories, road data bank, and pavement management system.

P003504.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>107国道项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）协助修建107国道，缓解交通拥堵状况，提高地区间商业一体化水平；（2）为项目影响区域内的交通提供便利；（3）加强省际干线公路运行工作协调，促进河北和河南两省之间货物和人员顺畅流动；（4）改进道路投资规划工作。项目内容包括：（1）修建石家庄至新乡出入受管制的双向四车道分隔公路；（2）在河北和河南实施连接道改造工程，对与本项目公路连接和交叉的14条省级公路进行升级改造；（3）项目公路和连接道改造工程施工监理；（4）石家庄至新乡公路运行工作省际协调及一项关于促进提高省际交通流量的研究；（5）公路运力研究；（6）人员培训；（7）购置公路运行养护、公路实验室、公路数据银行和路面管理系统所需设备。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
